body.p: Flynn reveals that he has been working with Mother Gothel this whole time. They made up a plan to let Rapunzel see the lanterns before Gothel locks her up in the tower FOREVER. Rapunzel feels helpless and tries to come up with a plan to escape but she is stuck in a boat far from the shore. Flynn takes her by surprise and ties her up and they set off back to the tower. The best moment of Rapunzel's life has turned into the worst moment.

Rapunzel has seen the lanterns and now it's time for her to live up to her end of the bargain. They start on the journey back to the tower so she can return Flynn's treasure. She thanks him for making her dreams come true and Flynn says he is happy he could make it happen. They talk the whole way back and return back to her tower safely.
